name: B. Pipeline
statement:
Vova, the Ultimate Thule new shaman, wants to build a pipeline. As there
are exactly houses in Ultimate Thule, Vova wants the city to have
exactly pipes, each such pipe should be connected to the water supply. A
pipe can be connected to the water supply if there’s water flowing out
of it. Initially Vova has only one pipe with flowing water. Besides,
Vova has several splitters.A splitter is a construction that consists of
one input (it can be connected to a water pipe) and output pipes. When a
splitter is connected to a water pipe, water flows from each output
pipe. You can assume that the output pipes are ordinary pipes. For
example, you can connect water supply to such pipe if there’s water
flowing out from it. At most one splitter can be connected to any water
pipe. Vova has one splitter of each kind: with , , , ..., outputs. Help
Vova use the minimum number of splitters to build the required pipeline
or otherwise state that it’s impossible.Vova needs the pipeline to have
exactly pipes with flowing out water. Note that some of those pipes can
be the output pipes of the splitters.
